scripts.install-ci: echo '# No additional dependencies need to be installed in ci mode'
scripts.install-dev: echo '# Installing all libraries on host for code editor support. TODO how to minimize as --only=dev affects devDepencies also?' && npm run install-all
scripts.install-all:www: cd www && npm install && if [ -d ./site ]; then cd site && npm install; fi
scripts.info:local: cat docker-compose.yaml | grep '# SHOW ON INFO'
scripts.lint: echo Running lint locally && npm-run-all --parallel lint:www
scripts.unit: echo Running unit tests locally && npm-run-all --parallel unit:www
scripts._dep-check_comment: TODO how to pass -u argument from dep-check to dep-check:TARGET?
scripts._dep-check-script: sh -c 'echo --- ${0} --- && cd ${0} && (npm-check ${@} || :) && echo && echo "NOTE: Many of the devDependencies and ~ references are actually in use even if reported unused. But all unused dependencies can usually be removed from package.json." && echo'
scripts.size-check:www: cd www && echo --- www --- && npm run analyze --
scripts.project-show: cat PROJECT.md | sed -n -e '/^## Contacts.*$/,/^#.*$/{ /^## Contacts.*$/d; /^#.*$/d; p; }'
scripts.docs: echo TODO: generate docs in package.json
scripts.scan: echo 'Linting is executed in Dockerfiles during build' && echo 'TODO: execute code analysis here?'
scripts.precommit:branch: if git-branch-is -q test || git-branch-is -q stag || git-branch-is -q master; then echo 'ERROR: You cannot commit changes directly to this environment branch. Only fast-forward merge is allowed.' && echo && exit 1; fi
scripts.precommit:lint: echo 'SKIP: Skipping linting on commit since we are already continuously linting during development.'
scripts.types: if [ -f .flowconfig ]; then flow; elif [ -f tsconfig.json ]; then echo TODO run typescript; fi
scripts.disabled-types: echo flow/typescript check disabled on prepush

hooks.pre-commit: if [[ "$taito_mode" != 'ci' ]]; then npm run precommit:branch && npm run precommit:lint; fi
hooks.pre-push: if [[ "$taito_mode" != 'ci' ]]; then npm-run-all --parallel lint disabled-types unit; fi
